about_the_game:
The flagship title from Awkward Wolf Studios! 

Suit Up is an exciting combination of RPG, rogue-like and twin stick shooters!
Immersive yourself into fun filled combat and explore handcrafted interactive environments set in a Sci-Fi futuristic universe!

BATTLE THE CRAWLER INVASION!

The planet is under attack! “Crawlers” ™  have begun a galactic invasion and have opened up strange portals all over the planet and are invading!

As a retired mech pilot, you will Suit Up! with an arsenal of weapons, ready to shoot, burn, freeze, electrocute the incoming threat. Be prepared to venture out into different and hostile environments, to eradicate the relentless alien bugs threatening to overwhelm your planet.

UPGRADE YOUR WEAPONS!

Unlock and upgrade your weapons to face even stronger enemies and rid the planet of the infestation.

Improve after every run, getting stronger by collecting Credits and Tech to build your ultimate battle mech.

EQUIP POWERFUL MODS!

Alongside improving your weapons, during each run you will be able to gather unique modifications which will change the effects of your weapons making them even more powerful! Play around with different builds to try all the unique modifiers and find the one that “Suits” you the most.

EVERY GAME IS UNIQUE

With a variety of content and a unique procedural level generation, every time you embark on your mission it will be a little different. This makes every run fun and enjoyable (although some might be harder than anticipated 😉 )

Upgrade systems, locations, modifications and unique enemies await you as you battle to free our planet!

DISCOVER SECRETS OF THE PAST!

As you battle across the planet you will uncover hidden secrets found in old data logs and ancient ruins. Learn more about the planet, the invasion and the events that led up to it in this compelling narrative.

GAMEPAD RECOMMENDED

Being a twin-stick in nature, a gamepad is recommended to play this game, however keyboard and mouse are supported as well.

short_description: A peaceful planet. An old battle mech, long forgotten. A new threat arises.It’s time to SUIT UP, survive an alien invasion and protect your loved ones in a world where Wave Survival, Twin Stick Shooters, RPG and Roguelite come together in one epic mashup!
